org.lucidfox.jpromises.core

Class PromiseFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AwtPromiseFactory, GwtPromiseFactory, JavaFXPromiseFactory

    @GwtCompatible
public class PromiseFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    A factory for creating Promise objects. It encapsulates a DeferredInvoker to create Promise objects using the specified deferred invocation policy.

    Note: In the JavaScript Promises implementation, the methods returned by this class are present as static methods of the Promise class. Here, they are collected in a separate factory class to allow specifying different deferred invocation policies. This class is not made final, so that it can be subclassed with more convenience methods, or bound to a specific DeferredInvoker.

      Instantiates a new promise factory.

    • Method Detail

      • promise

        public final <V> Promise<V> promise(PromiseHandler<V> handler)
        Instantiates a new Promise with the given PromiseHandler. The execution of the promise handler starts immediately.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type of the promise
        Parameters:
        handler - the promise handler
        Returns:
        the new promise whose evaluation is specified by the handler

      • ofNull

        public final <V> Promise<V> ofNull()

        Instantiates a Promise resolved to null.

        This method will rarely be used. Returning null from resolved/rejected callbacks does the same thing, and is faster. It may be necessary if interacting with custom thenables that do not allow resolved/rejected callbacks to return null.

        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type of the promise
        Returns:
        the promise resolved to null

      • resolve

        public final <V> Promise<V> resolve(V value)
        Instantiates a Promise resolved to the specified value. This is useful for returning a static value from resolved/rejected callbacks in then, which is allowed by the Promises/A+ specification, but not expressible in Java's static type system.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type of the promise
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the promise resolved to the value

      • deferResolve

        public final <V> Promise<V> deferResolve(Thenable<? extends V> thenable)

        Returns a Promise wrapping the given Thenable. If thenable is a Promise, then it is returned unchanged. Otherwise, this method creates a new Promise whose resolution is chained to the thenable's then method.

        Tip: This method can be used for typesafe casting of Promise<Derived> to Promise<Base> if Base is a supertype (superclass or superinterface) of Derived. Such use does not create new objects.

        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type of the promise
        Parameters:
        thenable - the thenable
        Returns:
        the promise

      • reject

        public final <V> Promise<V> reject(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Instantiates a Promise that starts rejected with the given exception as its rejection reason.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type of the promise
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception (rejection reason)
        Returns:
        the new promise rejected with the given exception

      • flatten

        public final <V> Promise<V> flatten(Thenable<? extends Thenable<? extends V>> layeredThenable)
        Performs the equivalent of the monadic "join" operation on a thenable that resolves to a thenable, converting it into a promise that resolves to the value of the inner thenable.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type of the inner and returned promise
        Parameters:
        layeredThenable - the thenable with two levels of wrapping
        Returns:
        the "flattened" promise with only one level of wrapping

      • all

        @SafeVarargs
public final <V> Promise<java.util.List<V>> all(Thenable<? extends V>... thenables)
        Returns a Promise that wraps multiple thenables or promises. The returned promise is resolved when all thenables are resolved, or rejected when at least one thenable is rejected. The returned promise's value is a list containing the results of the thenables passed to the method, in the order passed.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the lower bound for value types of the combined thenables
        Parameters:
        thenables - the thenables to combine
        Returns:
        the combined promise

      • all

        public final <V> Promise<java.util.List<V>> all(java.util.Collection<? extends Thenable<? extends V>> thenables)
        Returns a Promise that wraps multiple thenables or promises. The returned promise is resolved when all thenables are resolved, or rejected when at least one thenable is rejected. The returned promise's value is a list containing the results of the thenables passed to the method, in the order passed if thenables is an ordered collection, or in an undefined order otherwise.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the lower bound for value types of the combined thenables
        Parameters:
        thenables - the thenables to combine
        Returns:
        the combined promise

      • race

        @SafeVarargs
public final <V> Promise<V> race(Thenable<? extends V>... thenables)
        Returns a Promise that wraps multiple thenables or promises. The returned promise is resolved when at least one thenable are resolved, or rejected when at least one thenable is rejected. It is set to the state of the first thenable to be resolved or rejected.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the lower bound for value types of the combined thenables
        Parameters:
        thenables - the thenables to combine
        Returns:
        the combined promise

      • race

        public final <V> Promise<V> race(java.lang.Iterable<? extends Thenable<? extends V>> thenables)
        Returns a Promise that wraps multiple thenables or promises. The returned promise is resolved when at least one thenable are resolved, or rejected when at least one thenable is rejected. It is set to the state of the first thenable to be resolved or rejected.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the lower bound for value types of the combined thenables
        Parameters:
        thenables - the thenables to combine
        Returns:
        the combined promise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this promise factory, which includes the string representation of the deferred invoker. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
